name: Rube Goldberg machine (Nicola.carsley)
description: This piece uses assets to create a scene in a sort of dream space. Here we see an apple tree, as you press play a chain reaction occurs of apples falling out of the tree, triggering the next apple and so on. Some of the apples fall into a bucket at the bottom, some do not. The game gives the player the feeling that someone has created the system to collect food.
